post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, February 19
post.Content:
An extremely quiet week this week - only a few links which will make for very quick reading :-) Enjoy!

  • Gerrit Grunwald has another cool 'Friday Fun Component', this time a parallel coordinates chart.
  • Florian Brunner has released Drombler FX v0.11. Drombler FX is a modular application framework for JavaFX, and this release comes with two new JavaFX controls: a StatusBar and a ProgressMonitor.
  • Pedro Duque Vieira has blogged about updates to JMetro.
  • Jyloo Software have announced that Synthetica V3.1.0 has been released, and blogged about Synthetica UI scaling in detail.
